parameters.query:
SELECT *
FROM purchases_key
WHERE offer_id = $1 AND launch_tag = 'SSP-L20' AND phase = 'LANÇAMENTO'

SELECT *
FROM users
WHERE email = $1
OR RIGHT(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(phone, ' ', ''), '(', ''), ')', ''), '-', ''), 11) = RIGHT(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE($2, ' ', ''), '(', ''), ')', ''), '-', ''), 11) ORDER BY id_user DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT *
FROM launch_leads
WHERE email = $1 AND launch_key = $2

SELECT *
FROM launch_leads
WHERE email = $1 AND launch_key = $2

parameters.content: Procura na users o email ou telefone do comprador da purchase
Existe algum user, com telefone e email que veio da purchase?
Validar qual coluna do banco da survey_answer representa o email
fazer o set usando o email de entrada, e puxando as respostas da pesquisa encontrada pelo email anterior

parameters.query:
SELECT COUNT(id) AS qt
FROM execution_entity
WHERE "workflowId" = '{{$workflow.id}}'
 AND "status" IN ('running', 'queued', 'new', 'waiting')  
 AND "id" <> {{ $execution.id }} 
AND finished = false

SELECT *
FROM purchases_key
WHERE offer_id = $1 AND launch_tag = 'SSP-L20' AND phase = 'LANÇAMENTO'

SELECT *
FROM users
WHERE email = $1
OR RIGHT(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(phone, ' ', ''), '(', ''), ')', ''), '-', ''), 11) = RIGHT(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE($2, ' ', ''), '(', ''), ')', ''), '-', ''), 11) ORDER BY id_user DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT *
FROM launch_leads
WHERE email = $1 AND launch_key = $2

SELECT *
FROM launch_leads
WHERE email = $1 AND launch_key = $2

parameters.query:
SELECT COUNT(id) AS qt
FROM execution_entity
WHERE "workflowId" = '{{$workflow.id}}'
 AND "status" IN ('running', 'queued', 'new', 'waiting')  
 AND "id" <> {{ $execution.id }} 
AND finished = false
